messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: The Clown, Goose McSunny, Attempted to kill me, Alex Dowdall. I robusted his ass with the help of the chaplain.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I have cremated the clown's corpse. He is now a toasty clown

messages.author: Chief Engineer's Desk
messages.body: SSSupermatter Engine online, if you're ssstill having power isssuesss contact me

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Space Station 13 door subroutines. Severity level of 3. Recommend station AI involvement.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.
